description: Many aspects of life on the island resume as it scraps social distancing rules.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man becomes first in British Isles to live without lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man becomes first in British Isles to live without lockdown - BBC News
maintext: The lifting of the majority of guidance means Tynwald will sit in person on Tuesday for the first time since the start of April and from 22 June, all children will return to school and the island's speed limits, which had been limited to a maximum of 40mph, will return to normal.
